solution_line_template: 8 pints of paint cost ${cost_per_pint} each so they would cost her {num_pints_needed}*{cost_per_pint} = $<<{num_pints_needed}*{cost_per_pint}={cost_8_separate_pints}>>{cost_8_separate_pints}

8 pints of paint cost ${cost_8_separate_pints} or she could buy a gallon of paint for ${cost_gallon_paint}. If she buys a gallon, she will save {cost_8_separate_pints}-{cost_gallon_paint} = ${money_saved}
